body: I feel like we could have a tea party everyday on the server there is so many hackers. Yet another one. PLEASE GET MORE STAFF!!!

Stop making these posts on the forum please. Record the hacker (if possible) and create a new topic under the section called "Report a Player". I'll lock this thread to prevent any spam.
